ai.summary: Meadow Nature Trail is a 6.6 km moderate hike in the UK countryside. The route traverses grassy meadows, hedgerows, and light woodland, offering a peaceful nature experience with occasional gentle climbs. Suitable for walkers with some experience and decent footwear.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily grassy and dirt paths through open meadows, with sections of shaded woodland and occasional uneven ground. Expect uneven surfaces after rain and a few gentle ascents or descents; surfaces can be slippery when wet.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for changeable UK weather and varying light; stay on marked paths; inform someone of your route and expected return. Wear sturdy footwear, bring layers and waterproof gear, and carry water and a small first aid kit. Be mindful of livestock and wildlife, and check local notices for closures. Carry a map or offline GPS and know how to use it.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn (dry, mildly warm conditions are most comfortable; winter hiking is possible with proper gear)
